summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3019, for the improvement of Westlake Avenue North from the south margin of Mercer Street to the north margin of Valley Street produced, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36331 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
